Function reference

Package overview

piar-package piar
Price Index Aggregation

Calculate price indexes

Functions to make elemental and aggregated price indexes

elemental_index()
Make elemental price indexes
as_index()
Coerce to a price index
aggregate(<chainable_piar_index>) aggregate(<direct_piar_index>)
Aggregate elemental price indexes
mean(<piar_index>)
Aggregate a price index over subperiods
summary(<piar_index>)
Summarize a price index
vcov(<aggregate_piar_index>)
Bootstrap variance for a price index with replicate weights
is_index() is_chainable_index() is_direct_index() is_aggregate_index()
Price index objects

Manipulate price indexes

Helpful functions for working with price indexes

chain() unchain() rebase()
Chain and rebase a price index
merge(<aggregate_piar_index>) merge(<chainable_piar_index>) merge(<direct_piar_index>)
Merge price indexes
stack(<aggregate_piar_index>) stack(<chainable_piar_index>) stack(<direct_piar_index>) unstack(<piar_index>)
Stack price indexes
`[`(<aggregate_piar_index>) `[`(<piar_index>) `[<-`(<aggregate_piar_index>) `[<-`(<piar_index>)
Extract and replace index values
head(<piar_index>) tail(<piar_index>)
Return the first/last parts of an index
contrib()
Extract percent-change contributions
levels(<piar_index>) `levels<-`(<piar_index>) `levels<-`(<aggregate_piar_index>) time(<piar_index>) `time<-`(<piar_index>) start(<piar_index>) end(<piar_index>)
Get the attributes for a price index
as.matrix(<piar_index>) as.data.frame(<piar_index>)
Coerce an index into a tabular form

Manipulate prices

Helpful functions for working with prices

carry_forward() shadow_price()
Impute missing prices
price_relative()
Calculate period-over-period price relatives

Aggregation structure

Functions to make and work with price-index aggregation structures

aggregation_structure()
Make a price index aggregation structure
expand_classification()
Expand a hierarchical classification
as_aggregation_structure() is_aggregation_structure()
Coerce to an aggregation structure
as.matrix(<piar_aggregation_structure>) as.data.frame(<piar_aggregation_structure>)
Coerce a price index aggregation structure into a tabular form
weights(<piar_aggregation_structure>) `weights<-`(<piar_aggregation_structure>) levels(<piar_aggregation_structure>)
Methods to get the weights and levels for a price index aggregation structure
update(<piar_aggregation_structure>)
Update a price index aggregation structure

Sample data

ms_prices ms_weights fs_prices fs_weights
Price data
